title: Page 15
content: WAY off up in Northland> His hand to his eyes, In his door stood Santa Claus Scanning the skies; He saw Mother Snowbank Go off in a huff, And he knew where the snowflakes Were well enough; For he shook his head, And he laughed "Ho, ho, ho! Tell me of a Christmas Without any snow, It's time I was getting Things ready to go!"

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
